title: My pixel 4 won't upgrade to android 11
content:
My pixel 4xl can't find my OTA update. It's last update was an August 5th security patch. Android 11 has been out for almost two weeks. I should have it by now.

Phone has been manually checked for updates multiple times, restarted, google play services data and cache cleared, ran in safe mode. All the same results. Anybody have some advice?
